page.title: 19CHADDESLEY CORBETT CHARITIES
page.content: The existing charities in Chaddesley Corbett benefit old and young. The Margaret Delebere Almshouse Trust maintains 5 almshouses for 5 poor widows. Elderly residents of the parish receive annual gifts from the Jonathan Harrison Charity on St. Thomas Day, 21st December. Money instead of bread is now distributed from the Sebright Endowment (Bread) Charity to 14 needy persons. Schoolchildren benefit from the Chaddesley Corbett Educational Foundation Funds' income from property and land. The Village Hall Trust is a registered charity. The Charles Mann charity is for the oldest and most deserving living near Bluntington Methodist Chapel. The Harry Griffin charity helps the upkeep of the same Chapel.
